articles.title: Tokyo Olympics: Family of 14-year-old Chinese diving star turn down free property and $41k in cash rewards - AsiaOne
articles.description: The new-found stardom of Olympic gold medallist Quan Hongchan has led to a deluge of gifts and crowds of tourists visiting her home village.
